subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: The thermal energy load limit of a space, measured in MJ/m2.annum, is calculated in accordance with the following formula:

ol.li: TLL MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaGaamivaiaadY eacaWGmbaaaa@386F@ R0lGODlhHgARAPAAAP///wAAACwAAAAAHgARAAACN4SPqcvtD6MJtFZgU1bh9AkuH4d846hBaEiq 7eusGCPDbOriNg2fpWgz6TyXieVyLEqWzKbzUQAAIf8LTWF0aFR5cGUwMDHTBQEABwREU01UNwAB E1dpbkFsbEJhc2ljQ29kZVBhZ2VzABEFVGltZXMgTmV3IFJvbWFuABEDU3ltYm9sABEFQ291cmll ciBOZXcAEQRNVCBFeHRyYQASAAghL0WPRC9BUPQQD0dfQVDyHx5BUPQVD0EA9EX0JfSPQl9BAPQQ D0NfQQD0j0X0Kl9I9I9BAPQQD0D0j0F/SPQQD0EqX0RfRfRfRfRfQQ8MAQABAAECAgICAAIAAQEB AAMAAQAEAAAKAQACAINUAAIAg0wAAgCDTAAAAAAh/wtNYXRoVHlwZTAwM+I8P3htbCB2ZXJzaW9u PSIxLjAiPz48IS0tIE1hdGhUeXBlQFRyYW5zbGF0b3JANUA1QE1hdGhNTDIgKENsaXBib2FyZCku dGRsQE1hdGhNTCAyLjAgKENsaXBib2FyZClAIC0tPjxtYXRoIHhtbG5zPSdodHRwOi8vd3d3Lncz Lm9yZy8xOTk4L01hdGgvTWF0aE1MJz48bXJvdz48bWk+VDwvbWk+PG1pPkw8L21pPjxtaT5MPC9t aT48L21yb3c+PC9tYXRoPjwhLS0gTWF0aFR5cGVARW5kQDVANUAgLS0+ACH/C01hdGhUeXBlMDAy BgIAAAAAAAA7 = the thermal energy load limit; and
